file_content.text: Thanks again! You see any more Sand People, you shoot them in the face for me, will you?
Would you look at all this? I should have asked you to bring me back a Sarlacc while you were at it!
You lot are practically a small army!
We're in your debt, Master Jedi.
That's some fine work, soldier.
You do good work, friend.
That ought to make the Sand People think twice about attacking travelers. At least for a while.
There are plenty more Sand People out there. This probably isn't over.
Stay alert.
It never is.
It was my pleasure.
We're lucky you came by.
I'll let you get back to work.
Thank you. A lot of farmers and miners owe you their lives.
Good luck out there. Bring me back whatever rifles those Sand People are carrying.
Let me guess, you're here to complain about the Sand People, right? Took a shot at you?
You're not the first traveler they've attacked, and you won't be the last either. You're lucky you're in one piece.
I'll tell you what I tell everyone: There's nothing I can do. Too many of them and not enough of me.
This sounds like my specialty.
That's mighty kind of you to offer, friend. Here's hoping you don't get shot for it.
I hadn't heard anything.
You mean you didn't get shot at? Well, you're one of the lucky ones, then.
Sand People are acting more territorial than usual, even for Sand People. Crazy natives are shooting everything that crosses the wastes.
You want to help? Get those rifles away from them. That'd save me a world of trouble.
I'm not sure why you'd want a bunch of Sand People's guns. You a collector?
What do you want them for?
Helps me sleep better at night. Every rifle you take from them is one less they can shoot me with.
Be patient. I'll return soon.
Good luck to you, Master Jedi.
I foresee no difficulty there.
You're a lot more confident than I am. Here's hoping things go as smooth as you think.
Piece of cake.
I wish you luck, soldier.
There some kind of reward?
I'll scrounge up some sort of payment for you, if you decide to help out.
I'll be here to take those rifles off your hands. Go bust some heads!
Not my concern. [Refuse quest]
Figured that out already, thanks.
I'm busy right now. You're going to have to come back when things settle down.
What's a Sand Person?
Oh? The Sand People... they're native to the desert, savage and bloodthirsty. Can't talk to them--they murder any outsiders they find.
Tribes don't have a lot of tech, but they're good at scavenging and they've been on the offensive lately.
